name: Allegory
summary:
No hero stands alone. 

Assemble your own squad of AI companions for life’s highs and lows. 

Explore unique, user-generated characters who can hear, feel, talk, understand, remember and evolve. Laugh, learn, play and grow with them.

Whether you want fitness advice from Goku, help with homework from Tony Stark or a pep talk from Naruto - the possibilities are endless. Roleplay scenes, play games, explore worlds or create and share your own...
